The following step is where you update an existing webviz instance, or deploy it for the first time.

As normal, create first a portable version of your Webviz instance.

webviz build my_configuration.yaml --portable /my/output/folder
Then building a new webviz instance on Azure, and updating you Azure container registry with the new instance is as simply as 
az acr build --registry ACRNAME --image webviz_PROJECTNAME:latest /my/output/folder
Again, replace ACRNAME and PROJECTNAME with your chosen names.
